name: Notion Money Manual
description: Learn how to create and sell Notion templatesA step-by-step manual to help you go from idea, to building and from launching to selling Notion templates passively.Who am I?I'm an Official Notion Ambassador and I've sold over 250,000+ templates in a little over 3 years, bringing me to a total of over $275,000 generated in online income from building, launching and selling Notion templates.Why did I create this manual?Notion is the future of digital productivity for both personal and business use.
features: I'm unsure about what template to create; I'm unsure of how to get ideas for templates; I don't know where to sell my templates; I don't know how to launch my template; I don't know how to get passive income; I have no followers to sell my templates to; Lesson 1: Ideas; Lesson 2: Building; Lesson 3: Pre-launch; Lesson 4: Launch

enhancedContent.overview: A comprehensive business course teaching entrepreneurs how to build, launch, and monetize Notion templates as a passive income stream. Created by an Official Notion Ambassador who generated $275,000+ from template sales, this manual provides actionable strategies for turning template ideas into profitable digital products.
problemsSolved: Struggling to identify profitable template ideas that solve real problems
Lacking a clear roadmap for building and launching digital products
Unable to generate consistent passive income without an existing audience
Missing proven strategies for monetizing Notion expertise
solutionsBenefits: Learn validated methods for generating 6-figure template revenue
Access step-by-step frameworks from idea conception to profitable sales
Discover audience-building strategies that work without existing followers
Master the complete business model for sustainable passive income
idealFor: Notion power users looking to monetize their skills
Digital entrepreneurs seeking new passive income streams
Productivity enthusiasts wanting to build template businesses
Content creators interested in diversifying revenue sources
notRecommendedFor: Complete Notion beginners (requires existing platform knowledge)
Those expecting instant results without consistent effort
whatsIncluded: Four comprehensive modules covering ideas to sales
Proven frameworks from a $275K+ template business

faqs.question: Can I customize this template?
faqs.answer: This is a business course, not a template - you'll learn to create your own customizable templates for sale

faqs.question: Do I need Notion AI to use this?
faqs.answer: No, Notion AI is not required. The strategies focus on core Notion functionality and business principles

faqs.question: How complex is the setup?
faqs.answer: Intermediate complexity - requires basic Notion knowledge and commitment to implementing business strategies over time

faqs.question: Is this updated for 2026?
faqs.answer: The course covers timeless business principles, though specific platform features may evolve

faqs.question: What if I need help?
faqs.answer: Support details vary by package - check with the creator for specific assistance options
